analysis.description: AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#4-11) is declared view but contains assembly code

EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeEMONTBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#215-275) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bids[siteBids[index]].bidder == _bidder

EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeEMONTBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#215-275) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bids[siteBids[index]].bidder == _bidder
EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeETHBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#162-214) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bids[siteBids[index]].bidder == msg.sender

EtheremonAdventurePresale.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#134-147) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_sendTo,_amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#147)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeEMONTBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#215-275) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(lowestBid.bidder,lowestBid.amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#259-260)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.withdrawEther (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#124-134) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < endTime (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#130-133)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#134-147) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < endTime (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#138-139)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeETHBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#162-214) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- bids[siteBids[index]].bidder == msg.sender (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#209-213)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.placeEMONTBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#215-275) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- bids[siteBids[index]].bidder == _bidder (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#263-266)

EtheremonAdventurePresale.getLowestBid (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#298-303) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lowestAmount == 0 || bids[siteBids[index]].amount < lowestAmount (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol)

AddressUtils.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#4-11)
	- /unique_chucks/6/0xd76e916901c278dc445e4a808d87a4b34edaee25.sol#6-7
